ygData.subject: Crashing game
ygData.msgSnippet: Yea, my game keeps crashing while I m trying to use my new thief to beat my scenario #156, the Slime King.  Right before it crashes, things speed up

Yea, my game keeps crashing while I'm trying to use my new thief to 
beat my scenario #156, the Slime King.  Right before it crashes, 
things speed up significantly, then slow down right before it crashes.

(Of course, I'm running the game at speed 10 to wipe out the opponents 
and whenever the game started speeding up, I lowered the speed number 
to keep things from going out of control.)

Any ideas on why it keeps crashing.  I have nowhere near the 
experience points to crash the game.
